attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Arts are an important factor to our daily living, helping us to get by, be creative and for some of us, escape into worlds we would not normally live in and help us face the drama/relationships/issues in our own lives.Be it photography, painting, modern Art, Theatre, Film, Music. I ask that the government be aware when approaching its budget for the 2012 olympics (which has already trebled) that the Arts dont get left behind and forgotten.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
